Package ZombiesGame.model

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
ZombiesGame.model.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Item, Player, Projectile
public abstract class Entity extends Object
abstract class inherited by all game objects, stores data about position, velocity, activity, collision defines common methods for updating position, activity, collision, and checking for collision

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity​(int x, int y)
      Default constructor for Entity and inheriting classes that initializes starting position and collision, activity state
      Parameters:
      x - integer value specifying the x-coordinates of entity
      y - integer value specifying the y-coordinates of entity

  • Method Details

    • translate

      public void translate()
      Updates the x and y positions through current x and y velocities(dx and dy)

    • setInactive

      public void setInactive()
      Sets the entity to inactive (dead) once set to inactive, will remain inactive until deleted

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Gets the x component of entity position (needed in view for drawing)
      Returns:
      x component of position

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Gets y component of entity positions (needed in view for drawing)
      Returns:
      y component of position

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Gets whether the entity is active or inactive
      Returns:
      isActive field specifying whether entity is active/inactive

    • getHitBox

      public abstract Rectangle getHitBox()
      Gets hitbox defined by a rectangle Used for collision checks
      Returns:
      Rectangle with specific width and height, created at center of entity sprite

    • collidesWith

      public abstract boolean collidesWith​(Entity e)
      Checks whether entity collides with another given entity, assuming they reference different entities
      Parameters:
      e - given entity e that may collide with this entity
      Returns:
      true if this entity interacts with other entity 'e' and hitbox intersects, false if this entity doesn't interact with other entity 'e' or hitbox doesn't intersect
